org.jgrapes.portal.events

Class RenderPortletRequestBase<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jgrapes.core.internal.EventBase<T>
      • org.jgrapes.core.Event<T>
        • org.jgrapes.portal.events.RenderPortletRequestBase<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Future<T>, Associator, Eligible
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    AddPortletRequest, RenderPortletRequest

    public abstract class RenderPortletRequestBase<T>
extends Event<T>

    The base class for events that result in a portlet being rendered.
